structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
COUNTY EMPLOYEES' CIVIL SERVICE AND RETIREMENT

law.history: Repealed 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 321, sec. 41. -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 116, sec. 70. -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 2. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 34, sec. 8. -- Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 31, sec. 12. -- Created 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 167, sec. 18.
